players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Bob: "That is a lie, I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night. She is the mafioso."
Bob: "Alice is lying to cover herself. I investigated her and she is mafioso. Trust me, I'm the real detective."
Diana: "Bob is lying because he doesn't have any evidence to support his claim. I don't trust him."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob and he is mafioso. Diana is right - Bob has no evidence, just claims."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
